resource\\chatscheme.res.file_description: Chat box scheme. Tightly integrated with 'basechat.res'

resource\\clientscheme.res.file_description:
Defines (custom) fonts, borders and colours

Credits main header font: 'InstructorTitle'
Credits stats 'survivors': 'OuttroStatsCrawlUnderline'
Credits stats 'gameplay stats': OuttroStatsCrawlTitles
Credits stats text: 'OuttroStatsCrawl'
Credits 'space bar - return to lobby': 'DefaultLarge'

Game instructor popup font: 'InstructorTitle'
Radial: DefaultDropShadowBold
Radial selected: 'DefaultLargeDropShadowBold'
Radial font colour: 'White'
Survivor head overlay font: 'TargetID'. This font has outline hardcoded by default. enabling it again applies it twice and can cause strange effects

Font options
NAME:		font name as defined under 'CustomFonts' or installed on the operating system
TALL:		font size
WEIGHT:		the thickness of the font. This can be one of; 0, 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, 700, 800 or 900. Some fonts are limited in how thin or thick they can be
ITALIC:		italics
ADDITIVE:	seems to make the font slightly transparent and change colour based on the background
RANGE:		this is a hexadecimal range for defined for the range of characters we want to use. If you don't know much about font files, don't worry about this, just leave it for existing fonts and don't bother adding it for custom fonts
YRES:		range between x and y to use this font at
DROPSHADOW:	black shadow behind the font
OUTLINE:	outline around the entire font
ANTIALIAS:	antialias the edges

resource\\l4d360uischeme.res.file_description: Scheme for l4d specific built-in panels such as the warning message in the addons menu when there are conflicts. Msg header font: 'MainBold', Msg button font: 'DefaultBold', Msg content font: 'Default'

resource\\loadingdiscpanel.res.file_description:
Game paused panel. Changes require font reloading. 

CLoadingDiscPanel: hard coded 'xpos' & 'ypos'

resource\\sourcescheme.res.file_description: Defines (custom) fonts, borders and colours for 'built-in' source panels such as the console. Console font: 'ConsoleText', Console input font: 'DefaultSmall'

file_control_descriptions.ChatFiltersButton: Chat filters button. Hidden by default because it's buggy
file_control_descriptions.ChatInputLine: Chat input line. Hardcoded: 'ypos', 'tall'. These are calculated with values defined in 'chatscheme.res' fonts->Default

Spectator takeover survivor player after coming out of spectate. 1. spectate 2.' jointeam 2' or 'chooseteam'

resource\\ui\\teammenu.res.file_description:
'ChooseTeam' Choose team menu. Select which side to join, survivors/infected. Usefull cvar: 'vs_max_team_switches'. Usually when coming from spectator.

'Cancel' button borders: 'Button', 'RoundedButton'
Font: 'Default', though can be overwritten with 'font' property

scripts\\hudanimations.txt.file_description:
Defines some hud animations such as the item pickup icons though most are hard coded

---Confirmed working:
Misc:
- 'PulsePickedUpWeaponSlot'

Items:
- 'StartItemPickup1', 2 and 3
- 'CleanupItemPickup'

Voting:
- 'PulseYesVote'
- 'PulseNoVote'
- 'HideVoteBackgrounds'

file_control_descriptions.BuildableCostPanel: Progressbar looking panel. Unused but does show during hud_reloadscheme with lower host_timescale. Can be moved offscreen
file_control_descriptions.CHudAbilityTimer: Infected local player ability cooldown timer
file_control_descriptions.HudChat: Unused by the game. Overwritten by basechat.res
file_control_descriptions.HudFinaleMeter: 'Rescue countdown' Unused panel but does show during hud_reloadscheme with lower host_timescale. Can be moved offscreen
file_control_descriptions.HudHintDisplay: Game instructor. But is hard coded. Font: InstructorTitle
file_control_descriptions.HudHintKeyDisplay: Game instructor. But is hard coded. Font: InstructorTitle
file_control_descriptions.HudIntensityGraph: 'Build_up' survivor meter Unused panel but does show during hud_reloadscheme with lower host_timescale. Can be moved offscreen
file_control_descriptions.HudLeavingAreaWarning: (by default red) 'Please wait for your teammates' panel that sometimes shows at the start of a map
file_control_descriptions.HudPZDamageRecord: Kill feed eg: Player X killed smoker
file_control_descriptions.HudProgressBar: Progress bar. Healing/being healed, starting generator etc
file_control_descriptions.HudZombiePanel: Infected Tank approaching / Too far from Survivors
file_control_descriptions.HudZoom: Sniper zoom hud. Unused since its now hardcoded but does show during hud_reloadscheme with lower host_timescale. Can be moved offscreen
file_control_descriptions.PlayerLabel: Survivor Player Label floating above their head. Everything is hard coded, however the 'alpha' key works
